channel.title: Exporting history
channel.description:
Hi!
We are in the process of migrating our stackstorm environment to a new server and would like to keep the history. Is there any easy way of export and importing the history?
Best regards Patrik

item.title: Exporting history
item.dc:creator: Carlos
item.description:
Look into using mongo dump to save the database and use mongo restore to import it into the new instance

Read full topic
